title: Habits of Waste Founder on Combating Climate Change
itunes:title: Habits of Waste Founder on Combating Climate Change
description:
Sheila Morovati, President and Founder of Habits of Waste, talks about combating climate change by making simple changes in your life, such as reducing cutlery usage.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
